TopicTitle: Let's start at the beginning - The tutorials

Articles.Content:
I have to admit from the very start I did not have high expectations. But that was okay, we have to start somewhere. So I decided to start with a tutorials,  I have to give you credit for putting them in. But I have to wonder did anybody really ever go through and try them? They are so full of mistakes and bad advice. I had a number of instances where they just stopped working, where they crashed. 

My advice is don't do them. Find somebody on YouTube even if it's ksp1. Look at their tutorials for new players and learn from that before you even try to learn from the in game ones.

Grade F
